name: 2D Shooter (riveler)
description:
IMPORTANT: please you FULLSCREEN to test this, because some text is being cut off  :(

Hey there! Glad to introduce this game. There are Windows and WebGL game versions, that you can play in browser or download.

This version have some modifications over the tutorial:

  1.  Live counter at right top corner
  2. Healing artifact that give you 1 additional live
  3. Double score artifact that double your score (please note that you can't double 0 points score 😁)
